Time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Up! Celebrity 2
boardgame.description: Time's Up! is a charades-based party game for teams of two or more players (and is best with teams of two). Before the game begins, each player looks at several cards featuring famous historical or fictional characters and chooses some of them. Each player's cards are shuffled to form a deck, and this deck of famous names is used for each of the game's three rounds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In each round, team members take turns trying to get their teammates to guess as many names as possible in 30 seconds. In round 1, almost any kind of clue is allowed, and the cluegiver cannot pass on a card. In round 2, no more than one word can be used in each clue (but unlimited sounds and gestures are permitted); the cluegiver can pass on any card he likes, and the teammates can give only a single answer. In round 3, the cluegiver can use no words at all and can pass as often as he likes; again, teammates are allowed only a single guess. Give good physical clues in round 1, and they'll pay dividends down the road when you need to keep your mouth shut and gesture like a maniac before time's up!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Time's Up! is based on the public domain game known as Celebrities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save 30% or more off of every item we have listed on Boardgamegeek.com! Items are shipped within one or two business days upon reciept of payment (remember, money order, cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check or cash at your own risk!) If you do not wish to send payment and would rather pay us directly, you can give us a call at 816.554.7333 (Tuesday through Saturday) using Visa, Mastercard and American Express or by contacting us in order to make a Paypal payment (a 4.5% surcharge will be added to the total payment.) Shipping is based off of weight so it completely depends on the game(s) themselves though the average is $7 - $9.00 throughout the Continental US (and yes, we will combine on shipping!!!). If you need a specific type of shipping - such as Overnight or with Insurance - or have any questions, drop us an email. MO orders pay 7.35% sales tax. Also be sure to be on the lookout for PREORDER games being listed for the upcoming months! For more info about the store visit www.pfcomics.com (be sure to check out our forums for our weekly and monthly events).
